ns:serviceException.message: cvc-maxLength-valid: Value 'Provider Mock 12/123 dependantThoroughfare, thoroughfare' with length = '42' is not facet-valid with respect to maxLength '32' for type '#AnonType_addressLine2addressType'.cvc-type.3.1.3: The value '12/123 dependantThoroughfare, thoroughfare' of element 'addressLine2' is not valid.cvc-pattern-valid: Value 'M23 2se' is not facet-valid with respect to pattern '(GIR 0AA)|(((XX[0-9][0-9]?)|([A-Z-[QVX]][0-9][0-9]?)|(([A-Z-[QVX]][A-Z-[IJZ]][0-9][0-9]?)|(([A-Z-[QVX]][0-9][A-HJKSTUW])|([A-Z-[QVX]][A-Z-[IJZ]][0-9][ABEHMNPRVWXY])))) [0-9][A-Z-[CIKMOV]]{2})' for type 'postCode'.cvc-type.3.1.3: The value 'M23 2se' of element 'postCode' is not valid.
